channel.title: My server won't connect!
channel.description: Ok, the problem is the server won't connect. Heres the story: Yesterday i was editing my server and my friend came over and told me to come with him. So i exited out of everything and took my laptop to his house. When i got to his house i connected to his router and tried to get on the server. It didn't work. So i thought that maybe its his router? I came back home, and the server wouldn't connect for mine either(Even thoa i did it earlier with the router) Any help at all? :( :confused: :confused: Thanks

item.title: My server won't connect!
item.dc:creator: @TehHeadBanger TehHeadBanger
item.description:
@TehHeadBanger wrote:

So this is what it should look like?

item.title: My server won't connect!
item.dc:creator: @ballin2005 ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin2005 wrote:

Yea, you probably didn’t save when your where Port Fowarding. Just try Port Fowarding again.

Read full topic

item.title: My server won't connect!

item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

what for him? doesn’t for my brother >.<

item.title: My server won't connect!
item.dc:creator: @TehHeadBanger TehHeadBanger
item.description:
@TehHeadBanger wrote:

So what i need to do is, go to Portfoward.com and re-portfoward, and it should work?
Thanks guys!
(BTW, 127.0.0.1 works on the server just not The acutal IP)

Read full topic

item.title: My server won't connect!
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

no, when you portfoward i think it only allows 1 connection per router. My friend tried this round my house and i have portfowarded and my brother. It doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: My server won't connect!
item.dc:creator: @dhumiston dhumiston
item.description:
@dhumiston wrote:

this is probily because the router switched…it didn’t work on his router cause u have to port forward for every router you use…that means u might have to re port forward your router…

Read full topic

item.title: My server won't connect!
item.dc:creator: @TehHeadBanger TehHeadBanger
item.description:
@TehHeadBanger wrote:

Ok, the problem is the server won’t connect.
Heres the story:
Yesterday i was editing my server and my friend came over and told me to come with him.
So i exited out of everything and took my laptop to his house.
When i got to his house i connected to his router and tried to get on the server.
It didn’t work.
So i thought that maybe its his router?
I came back home, and the server wouldn’t connect for mine either(Even thoa i did it earlier with the router)
Any help at all?
Thanks

Read full topic
